wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Vaughan  (born 1864) was a Welsh international footballer. He was part of the Wales national football team, playing 1 match on 14 March 1885 against England.

response: *Thomas Vaughan (MP) (bef. 1479–1543), Member of Parliament for Dover
*Thomas Vaughan (died 1483) (c. 1410–1483), Welsh soldier, diplomat, and chamberlain to the eldest son of King Edward IV
